mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_board(bno, member_code, content, grade, reservation_code) VALUES(review_board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberCode}, #{content}, #{grade}, #{reservationCode})
mapper.select: SELECT rb.*, rr.hotel_code, rr.room_code, m.name FROM review_board rb LEFT JOIN room_reservation rr ON rb.reservation_code = rr.reservation_code LEFT JOIN members m ON rr.member_code = m.member_code ORDER BY rb.bno DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE review_board SET content = #{updateContent}, modify_date = sysdate WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_CODE FROM review_board WHERE BNO = #{bno}
